## SavedObjectsServiceStart.createInternalRepository property

Creates a [Saved Objects repository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.isavedobjectsrepository.md) that uses the internal OpenSearchDashboards user for authenticating with OpenSearch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createInternalRepository: (includedHiddenTypes?: string[]) => ISavedObjectsRepository;
```
